body.name: Codoule Waterproof Sling Bag Crossbody Backpack for Men Women Sling Backpack Hiking Daypack Multipurpose Cross Body Chest Bag
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 43 mins
features: Adjustable Sling Bag: The flexible strap of chest bag can be adjusted varied,You can freely adjust the shoulder straps according to your preferences.This crossbody backpack is perfect for men and women.

Large Capacity: Size: 13.8 x 6.7 x 3.6 inches.Shoulder bag with multiple compartments and pockets including a hidden security pocket, mobile phone pocket,big pockets with room for all your belongings. Sling backpack can effectively keep your belongings, such as cosmetics,tissues,keys, mobile phones,ipad mini,passports,water bottless,umbrellas,etc.

USB Charger Hole & Headphone Hole: Cross body bag with USB Charging Hole & Headphone Hole(without portable charger),You may charge your mobile phone easily with the USB charing port (using the implanted USB cable connect your potable power supply). A Mobile Phone Pocket in shoulder strap makes you convenient for charging and listening while walking.

High-quality Materials: Crossbody Backpack is made of high-quality PU leather material, which is durable,scratch-resistant,comfortable,waterproof and lightweight. High-density and strong hand straps will reduce your burden and travel easily.

【Multi-purpose Sling Backpack】 It’s a multipurpose bag that can be used as sling bag, sling backpack, crossbody shoulder bag, hiking daypack, travel chest bag, casual daypack, messenger bag, business bag, Perfect for Travel, Gym Sport, Hiking, camping, biking, family trip, office and other occasions…it’s light and comfortable to carry around. Enjoy an easier and happier life! (Note: This item is not intended for use by children 12 and under.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was not happy when I got it, but I needed it and it was affordable. I been using it, and It is good. It is light, has a good amount of compartments and I am able to carry my stuff without problems. The bag to carry my phone it is too small. The strap to hang it over my shoulder keeps sliding and I have to adjust it constantly, otherwise it hurts my neck. The material not the best but for the price is fine.So far I am happy with this bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good travel bag
reviews.reviewText: When going in and out of museums and other historical site they often make you check your smaller backpacks force you to load up your pockets with those things you might need during the visit. This bag is just the right size that they allow you to take it with you.One small con, I think I might have preferred a cloth rather then a faux leather solution as traveling in hot humid areas the bug starts to feel a little sticky.On the plus side it is that material that makes it waterproof.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little crossbody backpack for trips! Just read my Pros + Cons to decide for yourself.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this crossbody backpack to use on a trip to Universal Studios, Hollywood. I didn't want to take my purse or a large backpack. I compared other styles and liked the look and size of this one over the others. Also compared reviews before buying.Pros:-waterproof and easy to clean/wipe off any smudges from wearing lotion-plenty of pockets and space to hold wallet, keys, hand sanitizer, etc.-lightweight (when it has barely anything in it)Cons:- the more stuff you add to it weighs it down and the adjustable strap no longer stays in place where it was once adjusted to.- the smallest zipper pouch in the middle center, I ultimately used it to hold my phone. At first it was easy to slide in and out, but it is not deep enough, and it stuck out like 3 inches. After a week of use the lining of that pocket has ripped.- the little port looking thing on the side you can supposedly put a charging cable through, is totally useless. I tried to put my own cable through and it was almost impossible. I somehow managed to get the head of a lightning cable through but it was tough and ultimately I chose not to use it at all.-The thicker strap that has a cushion was too thick in my opinion, wish it was as thin as the adjustable part of the strap.-The strap did dig into my neck and rubbed when I had a lot of stuff in the backpack, I got a bit of a rash and had to constantly adjust to keep it from getting worse.Overall it worked for what I needed it for. Hope this helps those interested in getting one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfortable, versatile, convenient
reviews.reviewText: I wanted something small enough to fit under my jacket and doesn't count as a 'carry-on bag' but roomy enough to hold my essentials (headphones, passport, charger & cables). This one checks all my boxes and looks great, too. It is made from a soft material (almost feels like suede) but has rugged straps and big zippered pockets. Just 2 complaints: the adjustable metal buckle easily twists and causes the strap to bunch up and cause undue friction; and the zippers do not glide easily so that will also cause undue wear over time. I can probably remedy both of these issues myself but i wish they were solved by the mfg.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars good little bag made nice
reviews.reviewText: Like the size and leather has port hole for your electronics, only thing I do not like is the strap. it's too thin and cuts into the shoulder a bit, it should be a little thicker, not wider. The bag is good for when you need your hands free. plenty of pocket space for phone and essentials

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WORKS PERFECTLY!! Especially for a trip to the casino!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a cruise trip, but couldn’t wait to use it for that!It has so many compartments..isn’t too big at all! Great shoulderstrap! Expandable, perfect for my lg wallet AND passport!One of my friends even had me order her one! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Complete garbage- main picture is dishonestly edited to make bag appear MUCH bigger
reviews.reviewText: Garbage products like this make me wish Amazon would do a better job of managing product photos and descriptions, forcing sellers (especially from China who are really infamous for this) to prove they are providing accurate pictures of the items they sell. My stupid decision not to note the measurements given in the 3rd picture here. The first and main picture of this bag shows "beats style" headphones against the bag, and the bag is clearly 3-4 times the size of the headphones. Based on the high rating for this and that picture, I purchased this item, only to get it to realize it's basically a baby-sized pack that I cannot imagine how any real life-sized adult could even use.As you can see in my pictures, my headphones, a slightly larger pair of Senheissers would not even remotely fit into this bag, so, no way the headphones pictured on the item could fit, and if you somehow got them to fit, you'd have room for literally nothing else in this bag. This is much too small for a 10" kindle fire tablet. It's nearly too small for the kindle paperwhite if you want to add anything else to the bag.The strap is terrible...to resize it, you move the strap along a clip, but the metal clip is so cheap and poorly made that it will never stay in place no matter what you do. The material is very different than what the pictures make it look to be as well. The black color looks to be a weird leather-like material, but the blue, which is the one I got, does not look like that odd material. Sadly, it is. I am not sure what the material is, but it does not have a nice feel to it, and it's not something I've ever seen in any sort of backpack.You can tell this is a poorly made, mass-produced Chinese product. You can tell from the product information that whoever wrote the copy is not a native English-speaker, not inherently an issue, but I am sick of Amazon being littered with Chinese-based companies that almost always sell really cheaply made products and are infamous for editing their photos in such a way to dishonestly sell their products. The headphones in the main image are, in real life, a good 3 to 4 times the size of the ones edited into the picture. Now, I have to drive over to whole foods to return this and find a new product that is sized for an actual human adult, and try to find one that doesn't have dishonestly edited photos in their listing, and hopefully avoid a Chinese firm selling it, as I try my best to avoid these sellers- too much experience has told me, very few of them can be trusted to accurately depict their products, and this experience has strengthened that notion.

reviews.reviewTitle: 🟨🟨🟨 DIMENSIONI CONTENUTE RISPETTO ALL’INSERZIONE, BUONA QUALITA’ DEI MATERIALI 🟨🟨🟨
reviews.reviewText: La borsa al primo impatto appare molto carina esteticamente (scelto colore blu), in quanto curata nei particolari e con un tessuto morbido al tatto ed assolutamente impermeabile.Ha la capienza poco di più di un classico borsello a vita, ciò lo specifico per informazione, in quanto io personalmente giudicando dalle immagini, mi aspettavo un oggetto di dimensioni lievemente maggiori.Quindi risulta pratico, ma per contenere oggetti di piccola taglia: cellulare, portafoglio, ecc…La tracolla presenta la comodità di poterla regolare in lunghezza, quindi adattabile ad ogni esigenza.Gli scomparti presenti con cerniera sono tre: uno (il più capiente) presenta anche una piccola ed utile tasca interna,questo scomparto è inoltre dotato sia di un foro per passaggio cavo cuffie cellulare, che di un alloggiamento di cavo USB (peraltro fornito) per ricarica. Gli altri due scomparti sono di piccole dimensioni ma ugualmente funzionali. Altro ed ultimo piccolo scomparto, è chiudibile tramite un moschettone esterno rapido, che potrebbe anche essere utilizzato per il trasporto di un piccolo indumento (maglia, sciarpa,berretto, ecc…).La valutazione globale risulta a mio parere soddisfacente, come pure il rapporto qualità/prezzo; ne consiglio pertanto l’acquisto, ribadendo però che trattasi di oggetto di dimensioni contenute.Ho avuto modo di recensire questo prodotto con totale imparzialità grazie al programma Amazon Vine del quale faccio parte.

È veramente un'ottimo zainetto monospalla,mi piace veramente tanto,e nella versione color kaki è sicuramente molto bella perché le cerniere nere creano uno stacco con la tela color kaki creando dei dettagli lineari,belli ed ordinati.L'ho trovato particolarmente comodo perché è piccolo ma con tanti scompartimenti,e anche posizionandolo frontalmente non mi disturba al contrario dei classici zainetti,ottimo soprattutto per chi va in bici o in moto,ha tantissime tasche e una tela impermeabile e molto robusta.Concludo dicendo che sono molto soddisfatta del prodotto e ritengo il prezzo di vendita abbastanza giusto,5 stelle meritatissime 👌👌👌Spero che la mia recensione sincera e imparziale vi sia stata utile e vi sia piaciuta 😊😊😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Splash proof and you have more space than it looks...
reviews.reviewText: This sling bag has a very smooth, rubber feel to it, and it does smell of plastic as soon as you take it out of the packaging, which is a simple translucent bag. The smell is very similar to children’s swimming armbands and is quite strong. It doesn’t take too long for the smell to go away, or at least be hardly noticeable so that’s a good thing. The shoulder bag is quite small so is ideal for carrying smaller items, especially items that you don’t want to get wet. It is made from faux leather and feels extremely strong with good stitching. The shoulder strap is adjustable and has a strong, adjustable belt with buckle. There are plenty of compartments on this bag as the main compartment is held closed with a zip and inside there is a little pocket at the back. On the front of the bag is a slightly horizontal zip with a small compartment. The front pouch is also held closed with a zip and has a silver emblem on the front which looks a little out of place as there is no name on it, just a blank emblem so maybe you could engrave the owners name on it yourself. There is a USB extension in the bag which allows you to install it into the USB hole in the side and have a power bank inside (not included) so you can charge your devices which use a USB-A connection. Very handy to have and it keeps your power bank dry if you decide to use one. There is also a hole in the side which allows you to feed your headphones through and keep your phone/mp3 player in your bag, nice and dry, and listen to your music. A very handy sling bag if you don’t need to carry a lot of things with the added bonus of being splash proof…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is what I'd describe as an essentials and gadget bag. Whether for women who don't want a handbag or men who have too much stuff to pack into their pockets, this is an excellent choice.The bag has many pockets, which allows you to organise your belongings. You have a larger middle section that will take a small to medium sized tablet or even couple of books and you have various smaller pockets for anything from phones to wallets to keys to power banks to snacks and so on. There's even a quick access section that isn't zipped that you can place a mac or snack bars, for example.The bag is pretty sleek looking. I picked up the blue version and I think it looks great for either a guy or girl. The waterproofing of the bag gives it a nice almost shiny quality whilst remaining pretty subtle. The silver zips are almost chrome-like in appearance and the jet black zippers and straps complement everything well.You get some nifty features on this bag such as a hole for your headphones (although I imagine most people are using Bluetooth these days), a USB port that you can connect a powerbank to (so it's possible to carry your phone and plug it into the port on the outside of the bag), and a security buckle to make it harder for pickpockets to access the middle section of the bag.Overall, this is a really cool little bag and I'll be getting a lot of use from it! :)

reviews.reviewTitle: Codoule - Tracolla funzionale con rivestimento in nylon, idrorepellente e di buona qualità
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. 📜 Descrizione:Questo articolo, attualmente non disponibile ma che veniva sui 30€, arriva in una bustina trasparente chiusa.All'interno è presente la tracolla di colore nero... l'aspetto è grazioso, al tatto si sente la qualità del nylon ed il suo essere idrorepellente (non impermeabile), le finiture sono curate, le cuciture ben elaborate e rinforzate.Per quanto riguarda il comfort troviamo parecchie tasche... frontalmente ce ne sono 2 con la zip poi, quando si apre la fibbia si accede subito ad una tasca senza cerniera ed al vano principale con zip... in cui è presente anche una taschina laterale ed è qui che si potrebbe mettere la Power Bank in modo da connetterla al cavo USB interno.Quindi troviamo spazio per metterci tutto l'occorrente per andare a mare, in gita con la macchina oppure la classica vacanza del weekend fuori porta... ma anche per andare giornalmente in ufficio, infatti c'è spazio per inserire le chiavi, due cellulari, un piccolo ombrello (per quando piove), fazzoletti ed anche una boccettina di gel disinfettante... ma, logicamente la si può riempire con tutto il necessario che si desidera. A livello di capienza la trovo sulla media, quindi ha rispettato le aspettative.Come scritto possiede una presa USB laterale per darci la possibilità di ricaricare il cellulare o altri dispositivi USB che abbiano una porta Type A (per far ciò è necessaria una Power Bank connessa all'interno della tracolla e non inclusa) e, poco più sopra, è presente anche un foro con anello in alluminio per il passaggio del cavo delle cuffie... così da poter ascoltare musica, camminando.Per quanto riguarda l'ultimo punto... l'impermeabilità... come accennato prima qui si parla di idrorepellenza ma bisogna sempre fare un po' attenzione alla tasca senza chiusura zip che potrebbe essere soggetta ad infiltrazioni, in caso di pioggia di normale intensità.In generale la trovo una buona tracolla, con uno spallaccio sottile ma confortevole, un design curato e buoni materiali... il costo lo trovo congruo intorno ai 20€Quindi, per tutto ciò scritto (basandomi sull'articolo arrivato), la mia personale valutazione è 5 stelle su 5.🖊️ Ps: In caso di novità effettuerò un aggiornamento.Ti saluto con la speranza d'aver risposto alle tue domande, dubbi o semplicemente alle tue curiosità... grazie per aver letto le mie parole e spero che questa mia recensione ti sia stata utile...Alla prossima!
